scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.start: npm run clear && node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build:dll && npm run dev
scripts.test: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=test node build/server.js &
scripts.rel: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=release node build/server.js &
scripts.pre: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=prerelease node build/server.js &
scripts.prd: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build/server.js &
scripts.fix: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=hotfix node build/server.js &
scripts.build: npm run clear && node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:dll && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.analyse: npm run build:client && node node_modules/.bin/webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/bundle-stats.json -p 8899
scripts.pm2:test: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=test pm2 start build/server.js --name=gzmx-app-test -i 0 --max-memory-restart 1000M
scripts.pm2:rel: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=release pm2 start build/server.js  --name=gzmx-app-rel -i 0 --max-memory-restart 1000M
scripts.pm2:pre: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=prerelease pm2 start build/server.js  --name=gzmx-app-pre -i 0 --max-memory-restart 1000M
scripts.pm2:prd: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=production pm2 start build/server.js  --name=gzmx-app-prd -i 0 --max-memory-restart 1000M
scripts.pm2:fix: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/cross-env NODE_ENV=hotfix pm2 start build/server.js  --name=gzmx-app-fix -i 0 --max-memory-restart 1000M
